We wish to notify you that the KDS 2024 International students Scholarship Competition is currently open to provide financial assistance and mentorship to students without the necessary means who demonstrate alignment with our values and want to further their education for the 2024 academic year.

Summary:

Eligibility:                           Masters, Bachelors, Course

Value:                                Up to $2,000

Course Start Date:             1 December 2024

Requirement for Application

In this regard, all interested students who have a special academic interest, and are passionate about something on a practical or theoretical level, need financial support for a research project, dissertation, project, or anything else can participate in the competition

The scholarship board requests applicants to Create a strong paper and receive a fine reward.

Eligibility Requirements:

  • Interested applicants must be High School senior students currently attending an undergraduate institution in the Fall of 2024 year,
  • A College student currently on Diploma, Bachelor’s, and Master’s programs
  • Applicants must be Resident in any country, international
  • The winners will be required to send us proof of their academic status or enrollment.
  • IELTS is also required.

Benefits

  • 1st place will be rewarded with $2000
  • 2nd place will be rewarded with $1000
  • 3rd place will be rewarded with $500

Requirement for Application

  • High School Transcripts (unofficial is sufficient)
  • Recommendation Letter (must be uploaded by the recommender to the student’s application in the platform)
  • Acceptance Letter (POE) for the undergraduate or postgraduate (Masters only) institution that the student will be attending in the Fall of 2024 or 2024
  • More awards can be found here and applied for separately.
  • Self-report GRE or GMAT scores (optional) in the Standardized Tests tile in the Academic History section.

Are you interested in the Scholarship? Apply Now

For more information about the Scholarship, you can Visit Scholarship Website here.
